text: Navit聞 yakshcho vy pokazuyete poslidovnykam svyatoho pysannya kozhnyy riznovyd chuda, vony ne proslidkuyut聞 vashi Qiblah. Ne budete vy slidkuyete yikhni Qiblah. Vony ne navit聞 sliduyut聞 za kozhnymy inshymy Qiblah. Yakshcho vy acquiesce yikh bazhaye, pislya znannya shcho prybuly do vas, vy budete nalezhaty z porushnykamy
